name: Chaos in the Cabin
description:
CHAOS IN THE CABIN (made for Ludum Dare 47)

“Welcome on board the future of flying!

We at Loop Airlines believe in the best prices, and won’t let you pay for unnecessary luxuries like comfort, safety or a pilot that stays on board for the whole duration of the flight. On that note, your pilot just parachuted off the plane, have a pleasant rest of the flight!”

############

Features

  • A physics-based chaos sim in which you need to reach the cockpit of a plane!
  • The plane doesn’t have a pilot and is constantly looping!
  • The game starts exactly 48 seconds after you accidentally ate an average dish containing peanuts which you are allergic to - so your movement is temporarily slightly hindered!
  • Lucky you!
  • Give it your all and bounce, jump and roll past floating suitcases, bags and obstacles to reach the plane controls

############

Controls 
[WASD / STICKS] - MOVE

############

by
Moritz Jäger / @jaegermoritz
